question: Why did the woman go to the old Witch?
answer1: She wanted to have quite a tiny, little child, but she did not know where to get one from.
answer4: She wanted to have quite a tiny, little child, but she did not know where to get one from.

question: What did the woman do after the old Witch gave her barley-corn?
answer1: went home and planted the barley-corn

question: How did the woman feel when a large and beautiful flower grew from the pot?
Who was scarcely half a thumb in height?
Who was was very ugly, clumsy, and clammy?
Why did the toad take Thumbelina?
answer1: She wanted have a beautiful wife for her son.
answer4: She wanted her to be the wife for her son.

question: How will Thumbelina feel when she is taken by the old toad?
What will the old toad do after she takes Thumbelina?
answer1: put her at once on a broad water-lily leaf in the stream
answer4: put her on a broad water-lily leaf in the stream

question: Why did the old toad place Thumbelina on a great green leaf surrounded with water?
answer1: She can't run away from them there.
answer4: She wouldn't be to run away from them there while they prepared the guest-champer under the marsh where she would live.

question: Where did the old toad live with her son?
answer1: a great wide stream, with slippery and marshy banks

question: Where did the old toad want Thumbelina to live?
Why didn't the old toad want Thumbelina to escape?
answer1: The old toad wanted Thumbelina to marry her son.
answer2: The old toad thought she would make a good wife for her son.
answer4: She wanted her to be the wife for her son.

question: How will Thumbelina escape from the old toad and her son?
answer1: The fish will help her escape from the toads.
answer2: The fish will nibble on the stem of the leaf she is sitting on.
answer4: The fish will help her escape.

question: Why did the little fishes want to help Thumbelina?
answer1: They thought Thumbelina was so pretty that they were very sorry she should go down with the ugly toad to live.
answer4: They were very sorry she should go down with the ugly toad to live.

question: What will Thumbelina need to do when winter comes?
answer1: need to find a place to stay
answer2: needed to stay in a warm place

question: Why did poor little Thumbelina go up to the door and beg for a little piece of barley from the field mouse?
answer1: She had not had anything to eat for the last two days.
answer4: She had not had anything to eat for the last two days.

question: What did Thumbelina do to save the swallow?
answer1: piled up the down more closely over the poor swallow, fetched her own coverlid and laid it over his head
answer4: piled up the down more closely over the poor swallow, fetched her own coverlid and laid it over his head

question: Why was Thumbelina unwilling to marry the ugly mole?
answer1: She had to live underground where the sun never shone, and she could not help bursting into tears.
answer4: She would have live underground where the sun never shone,

question: What did the Little Prince do when he saw Thumbelina?
answer1: took his golden crown from off his head and put it on hers, asking her her name, and if she would be his wife
